oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Curtiss-Wright technical presentation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An unidentified group of men inspect a model at an event ceremony marking the 15,000th "pursuit plane" produced by the Curtiss-Wright Corporation for the Allied war effort during World War II.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; United States. Army. Air Corps; Curtiss-Wright aircraft; Air pilots
